data.text: An aunt grows more treasured as time goes by
An aunt makes life a little sweeter
Being sister is an honor and Being an Aunt is priceless
Only an Aunt give hugs like a mother and share love like a friend
I am as lucky as can be the best aunt in the worlds belongs to me
Someone as special as you deserves to have an extra-wonderful birthday
Thank you for always being such a special part of my life
Happy Birthday to the epitome of the Cool Aunt
Wishing you warm thoughts happy times and pleasant memories
The best aunts are not substitute parents but they are co conspirators
I was really lucky that I had an aunt who was very inspiring to me
My aunty was different than anybody in my family on either side
I have always maintained the importance of aunts
Moms and dads offer love and support But aunts who share some of our best adventures
To the best aunt in the world may God continue to bless you with all the desires of your heart. happy bday
Because you are very special aunt It is so nice to have this chance to wish you the best of everything
Happy birthday to my incredible auntie
Dear aunty may your birthday be as beautiful and as special as you are
Today is the best day to share this You are the most fantastic aunt in the universe
I appreciate all that you have done for us
Dear auntie, you are a standout amongst the most magnificent ladies that I have met in my life
Warm wishes on your extraordinary day. Dear auntie
Thank you for being a part of my life, my favorite aunt. Best Birthday
Aunty, may God continue to bless you with all the best things in life. Happy Birthday
You are a special person to me and I wish you many more birthdays to come. I love you, happy bday
